definition: Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Victor has a very good voice and plays the violin very well.
sentences.chinese: 維特有一口好嗓音，而且小提琴也拉得很棒。

sentences.english: Project that started so that Vittel may tie to music.
sentences.chinese: 項目，開始使維特爾可綁音樂。

sentences.english: Shot was a free kick of 60 meters away.
sentences.chinese: 奇拉維特罰球的經典之作是60。

sentences.english: Later that morning, Werther informed the servant that he would be going on a trip.
sentences.chinese: 那個上午晚些時候，維特告訴僕人說他要出遠門。

sentences.english: Ludwig Wittgenstein says that human body is the best picture of human soul.
sentences.chinese: 維特根斯坦曾說過，人的身體是人的靈魂的最好圖畫。

sentences.english: It was just a little too preachy-sounding, Mr. Vitrano says.
sentences.chinese: 維特拉諾說，聽上去有點兒像是在說教。

sentences.english: Corvette is reintroducing the Grand Sport badge to its lineup.
sentences.chinese: 克爾維特是重新大體育標誌，其產品陣容。

sentences.english: It was Ovett in particular who helped drive Coe on to new heights.
sentences.chinese: 科勳爵能不斷受到激勵創下新高，尤其要感謝奧維特。

sentences.english: The Vitra Campus is located on the German side of the border shared with Switzerland and France.
sentences.chinese: 維特拉校園坐落在德國邊境，與瑞士和法國共有。

sentences.english: The annual legal limit is 1,000 microsieverts.
sentences.chinese: 年度規定極限是1000微西維特。

sentences.english: The problem may be Chenevert's promises for the future.
sentences.chinese: 問題可能出在切尼維特對未來的承諾上。

sentences.english: British hopes of a medal rested on Ovett.
sentences.chinese: 英國把獲得獎牌的希望寄託在奧維特的身上。

sentences.english: Thus formed a kind of state of Wittgenstein's philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 從而也形成了維特根斯坦的哲學樣態。

sentences.english: Is it me or does Dave Winer just whine too much?
sentences.chinese: 是我還是大衛維特牢騷太多？

sentences.english: Q. Sebastian Vettel, tell us about the incident with Robert Kubica.
sentences.chinese: 維特爾，和我們說說和庫比卡之間的事故。

sentences.english: This thesis reconstructs Wittgenstein's argument of ending philosophy in both early and late stage.
sentences.chinese: 本文重構了前後期維特根斯坦終結哲學的論證。

definition: Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
Nelson or Nillson (name)/Horatio Nelson (1758-1805), British naval hero
Jean-Paul Sartre (1905-1980), French existential philosopher and novelist
